Text.Page:
All right, what's up next here...ah, , you're the lucky winner of {@LinkCreature:20#30011002#cruel taskmasters}, {@LinkCreature:20#30011001#slave overseers}, {@LinkCreature:20#30011100#morale boosters}, and {@LinkCreature:20#30011000#slave foremen}!

They command the zombies, so...that should be fun. They'll be in the Halls of Gloom.

Talk to Danika when you're done. She should be...let me check...ah! Also on the first floor of the Tenebrous Mines.

One wonders why she doesn't just take care of them herself while she's down there....

Ah! Excellent!

Please take this for your contribution.
